  79 define([], function () {
  80     var Editor = function (option) {
  81         this.el = {
  82             titleEl: option.titleEl,
  83             contentEl: option.contentEl
  84         };
  85         this.status = {
  86             editorInstantiated: false
  87         };
  88         this.init();
  89     };
  90     Editor.prototype.init = function () {
  91 
  92     };
  93 
  94     Editor.prototype.launchEditor = function(value){
  95         var createCodeMirror = function (el, content, theme) {
  96             var codeMirrorOptions = {
  97                 theme: theme || 'xq-light-big',
  98                 tabSize: 4,
  99                 lineNumbers: false,
 100                 lineWrapping: true,
 101                 autoCloseBrackets: true,
 102                 extraKeys: this.keyMaps,
 103                 mode: {
 104                     name: 'markdown',
 105                     underscoresBreakWords: false,
 106                     taskLists: true,
 107                     fencedCodeBlocks: true
 108                 },
 109                 value: content || '',
 110                 placeholder: 'content'
 111             };
 112             return new CodeMirror(el, codeMirrorOptions);
 113         };
 114 
 115         this.editor = createCodeMirror(this.el.contentEl,value,null);
 116         this.status.editorInstantiated = true;
 117     };
 118 
 119     Editor.prototype.onPanelActive = function(data){
 120         // if editor has not be initiated
 121         // create one
 122         if(data.from == 'toolbar' && !this.status.editorInstantiated){
 123             this.launchEditor();
 124         }
 125     };
 126 
 127     Editor.prototype.launchEditorFromNode = function(node){
 128         if(this.status.editorInstantiated){
 129             this.save();
 130         }
 131         var value = node.getValue();
 132     };
 133 
 134     return Editor;
 135 });

 137 /* EventManager, v1.0.1
 138  *
 139  * Copyright (c) 2009, Howard Rauscher
 140  * Licensed under the MIT License
 141  */
 142 define(function(){
 143     function EventManager() {
 144         this._listeners = {};
 145     }
 146     EventManager.prototype = {
 147         addListener : function(name, fn) {
 148             (this._listeners[name] = this._listeners[name] || []).push(fn);
 149             return this;
 150         },
 151         removeListener : function(name, fn) {
 152             if(arguments.length === 1) { // remove all
 153                 this._listeners[name] = [];
 154             }
 155             else if(typeof(fn) === 'function') {
 156                 var listeners = this._listeners[name];
 157                 if(listeners !== undefined) {
 158                     var foundAt = -1;
 159                     for(var i = 0, len = listeners.length; i < len && foundAt === -1; i++) {
 160 +-------  3 lines: if(listeners[i] === fn) {---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 163                     }
 164 
 165                     if(foundAt >= 0) {
 166                         listeners.splice(foundAt, 1);
 167                     }
 168                 }
 169             }
 170 
 171             return this;
 172         },
 173         fire : function(name, args, context) {
 174             var listeners = this._listeners[name];
 175             // if args is not an array, make it an array
 176             args = args || [];
 177             if(!Array.isArray(args)){
 178                 args = [args];
 179             }
 180             if(listeners !== undefined) {
 181                 var data = {}, evt;
 182                 for(var i = 0, len = listeners.length; i < len; i++) {
 183                     evt = new EventManager.EventArg(name, data);
 184 
 185                     listeners[i].apply(context || window, args.concat(evt));
 186 
 187                     data = evt.data;
 188                     if(evt.removed) {
 189 +-------  3 lines: listeners.splice(i, 1);-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 192                     }
 193                     if(evt.cancelled) {
 194                         break;
 195                     }
 196                 }
 197             }
 198             return this;
 199         },
 200         hasListeners : function(name) {
 201             return (this._listeners[name] === undefined ? 0 : this._listeners[name].length) > 0;
 202         }
 203     };
 204     EventManager.eventify = function(object, manager) {
 205         var methods = EventManager.eventify.methods;
 206         manager = manager || new EventManager();
 207 
 208         for(var i = 0, len = methods.length; i < len; i++) (function(method) {
 209             object[method] = function() {
 210                 return manager[method].apply(manager, arguments);
 211             };
 212         })(methods[i]);
 213 
 214         return manager;
 215     };
 216     EventManager.eventify.methods = ['addListener', 'removeListener', 'fire'];
 217 
 218     EventManager.EventArg = function(name, data) {
 219         this.name = name;
 220         this.data = data;
 221         this.cancelled = false;
 222         this.removed = false;
 223     };
 224     EventManager.EventArg.prototype = {
 225         cancel : function() {
 226             this.cancelled = true;
 227         },
 228         remove : function() {
 229             this.removed = true;
 230         }
 231     };
 232 
 233     return EventManager;
 234 });

 243 define([
 244     'node',
 245     'history',
 246     'package',
 247     'event',
 248     'saver',
 249     'packages/editor',
 250     'packages/highlight'
 251 ],function (Node,History,Package,EventMgr,Saver,Editor,Highlighter) {
 252 
 253     var Everything = function (data, app, option) {
 254         this.data = data;
 255         this.app = app;
 256         this.index = 0;
 257         this.packages = [];
 258         if (!option.container) {
 259             // create a container
 260             this.createContainer();
 261         }
 262         this.frame = option.container;
 263         $(this.frame).on('click', function(){
 264             console.log('frame');
 265         });
 266 
 267         // theme
 268         this.themes = ['dark', 'light'];
 269         if (option.theme) {
 270             this.theme = option.theme;
 271         } else {
 272             this.theme = 'light';
 273         }
 274         $(this.frame).addClass(this.theme);
 275         $(document.body).addClass(this.theme);
 276         this.history = new History();
 277         this.packageMgr = new Package(this);
 278         this.init();
 279         // move to this.init
 280         this.initPackages();
 281         this.creating = true;
 282         this._create(data);
 283         this.creating = false;
 284         this.mode = 'insert';
 285     };
 286 
 287     Everything.prototype.init = function () {
 288         var app = this;
 289         // events manager for intern use
 290         this.eventMgr = new EventMgr();
 291         // events magager for packages
 292         this.packageEventsMgr = new EventMgr();
 293         this.crumb = new Crumb(this);
 294         this.saver = new Saver(this);
 295         // register event listener
 296         this.eventMgr.addListener('rootNodeChange', this.onRootNodeChange);
 297         this.eventMgr.addListener('valueChange', this.onValueChange);
 298 
 299         // app events
 300         this.appEvents = ['contentChange'];
 301         this.appEventsHandler = {};
 302         this.appEvents.forEach(function(v){
 303             app.appEventsHandler[v] = [];
 304         });
 305     };
 306 
 307     /**
 308      * Get Node value
 309      * @param type
 310      * @returns {*}
 311      * @private
 312      */
 313     Everything.prototype._getValue = function (type) {
 314         if (type == 'current') {
 315             return this.rootNode.getValue();
 316         }
 317 
 318         if (type == 'root') {
 319             return this.veryRootNode.getValue();
 320         }
 321     };
 322 
 323     Everything.prototype.getRootValue = function () {
 324         return this._getValue('root');
 325     };
 326 
 327     Everything.prototype.getCurentValue = function () {
 328         return this._getValue('current');
 329     };
 330 
 331     Everything.prototype.onValueChange = function () {
 332         this.saver.save();
 333     };
 334 
 335     Everything.prototype.createContainer = function () {
 336 
 337     };
 338 
 339     Everything.prototype._create = function (data) {
 340         var app = this;
 341         // create the tool bar
 342         //this._createToolBar();
 343         var rootNode = new Node(data, app);
 344         rootNode.adjustDom({
 345             type: 'append',
 346             el: this.frame
 347         });
 348         rootNode.setRoot();
 349         this.rootNode = rootNode;
 350         this.veryRootNode = rootNode;
 351 
 352         // create one global event listener to handle all events from all nodes
 353         var onEvent = function (event) {
 354             app.onEvent(event);
 355         };
 356         var events = ['click', 'keydown', 'propertychange', 'keyup', 'paste', 'cut'];
 357         $.each(events, function (index, value) {
 358             if (value == 'focus') {
 359                 app.frame.addEventListener(value, onEvent, true);
 360             } else {
 361                 app.frame.addEventListener(value, onEvent);
 362                 //app.toobarElement.addEventListener(value, onEvent);
 363             }
 364         });
 365         app.frame.addEventListener('input',app.event('input'));
 366         //app.frame.addEventListener('input', onEvent);
 367     };
 368 
 369     Everything.prototype.event = function(type){
 370         var self = this;
 371         // 使用闭包来保留this引用，不知道是否合适
 372         if(type == 'input'){
 373             return function(e){
 374                 var node = Node.getNodeFromTarget(e.target);
 375                 if(node){
 376                     // let node it self handle the event first
 377                     node.onEvent(e);
 378                     // fire the change event for packages
 379                     self.appEventsHandler['contentChange'].forEach(function(v){
 380                         v(node);
 381                     });
 382                 }
 383             };
 384         }
 385     };
 386 
 387     /**
 388      * Create the tool bar for global operations
 389      * @private
 390      */
 391     Everything.prototype._createToolBar = function () {
 392         var app = this;
 393         var toolbar = document.createElement('div');
 394         toolbar.className = 'toolbar';
 395         this.toobarElement = toolbar;
 396         document.body.appendChild(toolbar);
 397         var buttons = ['theme'];
 398         this.buttons = {};
 399         buttons.forEach(function (value, index) {
 400             var btn = document.createElement('button');
 401             btn.className = value;
 402             btn.innerHTML = value;
 403             app.buttons[value] = btn;
 404             app.toobarElement.appendChild(btn);
 405         });
 406         var newButton = crel('button', {class:'new-article'},'New Article');
 407         var buttonWrapper = crel('div',{class:'button-wrapper'},newButton);
 408         toolbar.appendChild(buttonWrapper);
 409     };
 410     Everything.prototype._createTitle = function (node) {
 411         var titleText = node.getContent();
 412         if (node == this.veryRootNode) {
 413             this.frame.removeChild(this.titleElement);
 414             this.titleElement = undefined;
 415             return;
 416         }
 417         if (this.titleElement) {
 418             this.titleText = titleText;
 419             this.titleElement.innerText = titleText;
 420         } else {
 421             // create title dom
 422             var title = document.createElement('div');
 423             title.innerHTML = titleText;
 424             title.setAttribute('contentEditable', true);
 425             title.className += "rootnode-title";
 426             this.titleElement = title;
 427             // insert to dom
 428             if ($(this.frame).children()) {
 429                 $(this.frame).children().first().before(title);
 430             } else {
 431                 this.frame.appendChild(title);
 432             }
 433         }
 434     };
 435 
 436     /**
 437      * Show 2 buttons when you zoom into the bottom node
 438      * @private
 439      */
 440     Everything.prototype._createAddButton = function () {
 441         var app = this;
 442         var self = this;
 443         var addChildBtn = document.createElement('a');
 444         addChildBtn.innerHTML = "Add a child";
 445         addChildBtn.setAttribute('href', '#');
 446         var launchEditorBtn = document.createElement('a');
 447         launchEditorBtn.setAttribute('href', '#');
 448         launchEditorBtn.innerHTML = 'Edit';
 449 
 450         var addBtnWrapper = document.createElement('div');
 451         addBtnWrapper.classList.add('add-wrapper');
 452         addBtnWrapper.appendChild(addChildBtn);
 453         addBtnWrapper.appendChild(launchEditorBtn);
 454         this.addBtnWrapper = addBtnWrapper;
 455         this.frame.appendChild(addBtnWrapper);
 456 
 457         // add child
 458         $(addChildBtn).on('click', function () {
 459             app.rootNode._createChild({});
 460             if (app.addBtnWrapper) {
 461                 app.frame.removeChild(addBtnWrapper);
 462             }
 463 
 464         });
 465         // launch editor
 466         // switch to editor panel
 467         $(launchEditorBtn).on('click', function () {
 468             //app.switchRootNodeWithPackage(['editor']);
 469             //if (app.addBtnWrapper) {
 470             //    app.frame.removeChild(addBtnWrapper);
 471             //}
 472             self.app.launchEditorFromNode(self.rootNode);
 473         });
 474     };
 475 
 476     /**
 477      * Register packages to the package manager
 478      */
 479     Everything.prototype.initPackages = function () {
 480         this.packageMgr.add('editor', Editor);
 481         this.packages.push('editor');
 482         this.packageMgr.add('highlight', Highlighter);
 483         this.packages.push('highlight');
 484     };
 485     /**
 486      * Get all the packages that registered in the app
 487      * for Node instance to extend it self
 488      * TODO: handle the situation when the package does not registered
 489      * @returns {Array}
 490      */
 491     Everything.prototype.getPackages = function () {
 492         var packages = [];
 493         var app = this;
 494         this.packages.forEach(function (v) {
 495             packages.push(app.packageMgr.get(v));
 496         });
 497         return packages;
 498     };
 499     Everything.prototype.switchRootNodeWithPackage = function (packages) {
 500         // concat the two array
 501         var nodeValue = this.rootNode.getValue();
 502         nodeValue.package = packages;
 503         var node = new Node(nodeValue, this);
 504         node.setParent(this.rootNode.parent);
 505         this.zoomIn(node, true);
 506         if (packages.indexOf('editor') != -1) {
 507             node.launchEditor();
 508         }
 509     };
 510     /**
 511      * Handle events on the application element
 512      */
 513     Everything.prototype.onEvent = function (event) {
 514         if (this.mode == 'move') {
 515             if (event.type == 'keydown' || event.type == 'focus') {
 516                 this.move(event);
 517                 console.log('keydown');
 518             }
 519         } else if (this.mode == 'insert') {
 520 
 521         }
 522         if (event.keyCode == 27) {
 523             this.setMode('move');
 524         }
 525         //if(event.type == 'focus'){
 526         //    this.setCurentNode(Node.getNodeFromTarget(event.target));
 527         //}
 528 
 529         if (event.type == 'click') {
 530             // toggle theme
 531             //if (event.target == this.buttons['theme']) {
 532             //    console.log('theme');
 533             //    this.toggleTheme();
 534             //}
 535             // bread
 536             if (event.target == this.bread) {
 537 
 538             }
 539         }
 540         if (event.type == 'keyup') {
 541             var a;
 542         }
 543         var node = Node.getNodeFromTarget(event.target);
 544         if (node) {
 545             node.onEvent(event);
 546         }
 547     };
 548 
 549     /**
 550      * Store history when a node is moved, removed, duplicated, etc.
 551      * @param {String} action action name
 552      * @param {Object} option
 553      */
 554     Everything.prototype.onAction = function (action, option) {
 555         if (action == 'zoomin') {
 556             var node = option.node;
 557             if (!node) {
 558                 return;
 559             }
 560             this.zoomIn(node);
 561         }
 562         if (action == 'valueChange' && option.node == this.veryRootNode) {
 563             this.eventMgr.fire('valueChange', null, this);
 564         }
 565         // add action to history
 566         if (this.history) {
 567             this.history.add(action, option);
 568         }
 569         // trigger Extension callbacks
 570     };
 571 
 572     Everything.prototype.onRootNodeChange = function (newRootnode) {
 573         // handle crumb
 574         if (newRootnode == this.veryRootNode) {
 575             this.crumb.hide();
 576         } else {
 577             this.crumb.render();
 578         }
 579 
 580         // handle add buttons
 581         // todo 让这些元素的创建顺序不要影响他们最终出现在DOM中得位置
 582         if (this.addBtnWrapper) {
 583             this.frame.removeChild(this.addBtnWrapper);
 584             this.addBtnWrapper = undefined;
 585         }
 586 
 587         // save changes
 588 
 589     };
 590     Everything.prototype.zoomIn = function (node, hasContent) {
 591         this.creating = true;
 592         var newRootNode = node;
 593         if (!newRootNode) {
 594             return;
 595         }
 596         this.frame.removeChild(this.rootNode.row);
 597         // TODO 这个refreshDom，问题大大的
 598         newRootNode.refreshDom();
 599         newRootNode.setRoot();
 600         newRootNode.adjustDom({
 601             type: 'append',
 602             el: this.frame
 603         });
 604         this.rootNode = newRootNode;
 605         this._createTitle(this.rootNode);
 606         //this._createBread();
 607         this.eventMgr.fire('rootNodeChange', this.rootNode, this);
 608         if (hasContent === false ||
 609             (hasContent == undefined && !this.rootNode.hasChild())) {
 610             this._createAddButton();
 611         }
 612         this.creating = false;
 613     };
 614 
 615     /**
 616      * Switch color theme of the app
 617      */
 618     Everything.prototype.toggleTheme = function () {
 619         var index = this.themes.indexOf(this.theme);
 620         console.log(index);
 621         var index = (index + 2) > this.themes.length ? 0 : index + 1;
 622         var oldTheme = this.theme;
 623         this.theme = this.themes[index];
 624         $(this.frame).removeClass(oldTheme).addClass(this.theme);
 625         $(document.body).removeClass(oldTheme).addClass(this.theme);
 626         // trigger theme change event
 627         this.eventMgr.fire('themeChange', [this.theme]);
 628     };
 629 
 630 
 631     /**
 632      * Set mode. 'move' mode, move the focus from one node to another
 633      * @param mode
 634      */
 635     Everything.prototype.setMode = function (mode) {
 636         var prevMode = this.mode;
 637         this.mode = mode;
 638         if (prevMode == 'insert' || this.mode == 'move') {
 639             this.curentNode.highlight();
 640             // blur
 641             //$(this.curentNode).blur();
 642             this.curentNode.row.setAttribute('contentEditable', 'false');
 643         }
 644     };
 645     Everything.prototype.setCurentNode = function (node) {
 646         var oldCurentNode = this.curentNode;
 647         this.curentNode = node;
 648         if (this.mode == 'move') {
 649             oldCurentNode.noHighlight();
 650             node.highlight();
 651         }
 652 
 653         //this.curentNode.highlight();
 654     };
 655     /**
 656      * Move focus from one node to another
 657      * Move to next node: j || ctrl+n ||  space
 658      * Move to previous node: k || ctrl+p  || shift+space
 659      * @param event
 660      */
 661     Everything.prototype.move = function (event) {
 662         event.preventDefault();
 663         if (event.keyCode == 74) {
 664             this.moveNext();
 665         }
 666         if (event.keyCode == 75) {
 667             this.movePrev();
 668         }
 669         return false;
 670     };
 671     Everything.prototype.moveNext = function () {
 672         this.index++;
 673         if (this.index == 2) {
 674             console.log(this.curentNode);
 675         }
 676         var curentNode = this.curentNode;
 677         if (curentNode) {
 678             var newCurentNode;
 679             if (curentNode.hasChild()) {
 680                 newCurentNode = curentNode.childs[0];
 681             } else {
 682                 newCurentNode = curentNode.getRelativeNode('after');
 683             }
 684             curentNode.noHighlight();
 685             newCurentNode.highlight();
 686             //this.setCurentNode(newCurentNode);
 687             this.curentNode = newCurentNode;
 688             console.log('c' + curentNode.getContent() + ';;;n' + newCurentNode.getContent());
 689         } else {
 690             this.moveToFirst();
 691         }
 692     };
 693     Everything.prototype.movePrev = function () {
 694     };
 695     Everything.prototype.moveToFirst = function () {
 696         if (this.rootNode && this.rootNode.hasChild()) {
 697             var firstChild = this.rootNode.childs[0];
 698             this.setCurentNode(firstChild);
 699             firstChild.highlight();
 700         }
 701     };
 702     Everything.prototype.moveToLast = function () {
 703     };
 704 
 705     /**
 706      * Add event handlers from outside. events:
 707      * 'contentChange',
 708      * @example: app.on('contenteChange', function(){
 709      *      self.handler();
 710      * })
 711      * @param {String} eventName
 712      * @param {Function} handler
 713      */
 714     Everything.prototype.on = function(eventName, handler){
 715         var eventsList = ['contentChange'];
 716         if(eventsList.indexOf(eventName) == -1){
 717             return;
 718         }
 719         this.appEventsHandler[eventName].push(handler);
 720     };

 724     /*========================================================
 725                           Bread crumb manager
 726       ========================================================*/
 727     var Crumb = function (app) {
 728         if (!app) {
 729             return;
 730         }
 731         this.app = app;
 732         //this.app.eventMgr.addListener('rootNodeChange', this.onRootNodeChange);
 733     };
 734     /**
 735      * Get dom for the crumb wrapper
 736      * @param path
 737      * @returns {Array} array contains all the dom of the crumb
 738      */
 739     Crumb.prototype.getDom = function (path) {
 740         var app = this.app;
 741         var self = this;
 742         var domArray = [];
 743         path.forEach(function (v, i) {
 744             var content = v.getContent();
 745             if (v == app.veryRootNode) {
 746                 content = 'Home';
 747             } else if (v.getContent() == "") {
 748                 content = 'noname';
 749             }
 750             var link = crel('div', {class: 'crumb-link'},
 751                 crel('a', {href: '#' + v.id}, content),
 752                 '>'
 753             );
 754 
 755             domArray.push(link);
 756         });
 757         return domArray;
 758     };
 759 
 760     /**
 761      * Append links to the crumb
 762      * or create crumb if not exist
 763      * and the append the links
 764      */
 765     Crumb.prototype.render = function () {
 766         var app = this.app;
 767         var self = this;
 768         if (app.crumbElement) {
 769             app.crumbElement.innerHTML = "";
 770             var path = this.app.rootNode.getPath();
 771             var domArr = this.getDom(path);
 772             domArr.forEach(function (v, i) {
 773                 app.crumbElement.appendChild(v);
 774                 // add event listener
 775                 $(v).find('a').on('click', function () {
 776                     self.onEvent($(this));
 777                 });
 778             });
 779         } else {
 780             // create a crumb wrapper and render again
 781             app.crumbElement = crel('div', {class: 'crumb'});
 782             if ($(app.frame).children()) {
 783                 $(app.frame).children().first().before(app.crumbElement);
 784             } else {
 785                 app.frame.appendChild(app.crumbElement);
 786             }
 787             this.render();
 788         }
 789     };
 790     Crumb.prototype.hide = function () {
 791         var app = this.app;
 792         if (app.crumbElement) {
 793             app.frame.removeChild(app.crumbElement);
 794             app.crumbElement = undefined;
 795         }
 796     };
 797     Crumb.prototype.onEvent = function ($this) {
 798         var app = this.app;
 799         var id = $this.attr('href').slice(1);
 800         var targetNode;
 801         var node = app.rootNode.parent;
 802         while (node) {
 803             if (node.id == id) {
 804                 targetNode = node;
 805                 break;
 806             } else {
 807                 node = node.parent;
 808             }
 809         }
 810         app.zoomIn(targetNode);
 811     };
 812     Crumb.prototype.onRootNodeChange = function (newNode, oldNode) {
 813         if (newNode == ths.app.veryRootNode) {
 814             this.hide();
 815         }
 816         this.render();
 817     };
 818 
 819     return Everything;
 820 });
 821 
 822 define(function(){
 823     /**
 824      * @constructor History
 825      * Store action history, enables undo and redo
 826      * @param {Everything} app
 827      */
 828     function History (app) {
 829       this.app = app;
 830       this.clear();
 831 
 832       // map with all supported actions
 833       this.actions = {
 834         'editField': {
 835           'undo': function (params) {
 836             params.node.updateField(params.oldValue);
 837           },
 838           'redo': function (params) {
 839             params.node.updateField(params.newValue);
 840           }
 841         },
 842         'editValue': {
 843           'undo': function (params) {
 844             params.node.updateValue(params.oldValue);
 845           },
 846           'redo': function (params) {
 847             params.node.updateValue(params.newValue);
 848           }
 849         },
 850         'appendNode': {
 851           'undo': function (params) {
 852             params.parent.removeChild(params.node);
 853           },
 854           'redo': function (params) {
 855             params.parent.appendChild(params.node);
 856           }
 857         },
 858         'insertBeforeNode': {
 859           'undo': function (params) {
 860             params.parent.removeChild(params.node);
 861           },
 862           'redo': function (params) {
 863             params.parent.insertBefore(params.node, params.beforeNode);
 864           }
 865         },
 866         'insertAfterNode': {
 867           'undo': function (params) {
 868             params.parent.removeChild(params.node);
 869           },
 870           'redo': function (params) {
 871             params.parent.insertAfter(params.node, params.afterNode);
 872           }
 873         },
 874         'removeNode': {
 875           'undo': function (params) {
 876             var parent = params.parent;
 877             var beforeNode = parent.childs[params.index] || parent.append;
 878             parent.insertBefore(params.node, beforeNode);
 879           },
 880           'redo': function (params) {
 881             params.parent.removeChild(params.node);
 882           }
 883         },
 884         'duplicateNode': {
 885           'undo': function (params) {
 886             params.parent.removeChild(params.clone);
 887           },
 888           'redo': function (params) {
 889             params.parent.insertAfter(params.clone, params.node);
 890           }
 891         },
 892         'changeType': {
 893           'undo': function (params) {
 894             params.node.changeType(params.oldType);
 895           },
 896           'redo': function (params) {
 897             params.node.changeType(params.newType);
 898           }
 899         },
 900         'moveNode': {
 901           'undo': function (params) {
 902             params.startParent.moveTo(params.node, params.startIndex);
 903           },
 904           'redo': function (params) {
 905             params.endParent.moveTo(params.node, params.endIndex);
 906           }
 907         },
 908         'sort': {
 909           'undo': function (params) {
 910             var node = params.node;
 911             node.hideChilds();
 912             node.sort = params.oldSort;
 913             node.childs = params.oldChilds;
 914             node.showChilds();
 915           },
 916           'redo': function (params) {
 917             var node = params.node;
 918             node.hideChilds();
 919             node.sort = params.newSort;
 920             node.childs = params.newChilds;
 921             node.showChilds();
 922           }
 923         }
 924 
 925         // TODO: restore the original caret position and selection with each undo
 926         // TODO: implement history for actions "expand", "collapse", "scroll", "setDocument"
 927       };
 928     }
 929 
 930     /**
 931      * The method onChange is executed when the History is changed, and can
 932      * be overloaded.
 933      */
 934     History.prototype.onChange = function () {};
 935 
 936     /**
 937      * Add a new action to the history
 938      * @param {String} action  The executed action. Available actions: "editField",
 939      *                         "editValue", "changeType", "appendNode",
 940      *                         "removeNode", "duplicateNode", "moveNode"
 941      * @param {Object} params  Object containing parameters describing the change.
 942      *                         The parameters in params depend on the action (for
 943      *                         example for "editValue" the Node, old value, and new
 944      *                         value are provided). params contains all information
 945      *                         needed to undo or redo the action.
 946      */
 947     History.prototype.add = function (action, params) {
 948       this.index++;
 949       this.history[this.index] = {
 950         'action': action,
 951         'params': params,
 952         'timestamp': new Date()
 953       };
 954 
 955       // remove redo actions which are invalid now
 956       if (this.index < this.history.length - 1) {
 957         this.history.splice(this.index + 1, this.history.length - this.index - 1);
 958       }
 959 
 960       // fire onchange event
 961       this.onChange();
 962     };
 963 
 964     /**
 965      * Clear history
 966      */
 967     History.prototype.clear = function () {
 968       this.history = [];
 969       this.index = -1;
 970 
 971       // fire onchange event
 972       this.onChange();
 973     };
 974 
 975     /**
 976      * Check if there is an action available for undo
 977      * @return {Boolean} canUndo
 978      */
 979     History.prototype.canUndo = function () {
 980       return (this.index >= 0);
 981     };
 982 
 983     /**
 984      * Check if there is an action available for redo
 985      * @return {Boolean} canRedo
 986      */
 987     History.prototype.canRedo = function () {
 988       return (this.index < this.history.length - 1);
 989     };
 990 
 991     /**
 992      * Undo the last action
 993      */
 994     History.prototype.undo = function () {
 995       if (this.canUndo()) {
 996         var obj = this.history[this.index];
 997         if (obj) {
 998           var action = this.actions[obj.action];
 999           if (action && action.undo) {
1000             action.undo(obj.params);
1001             if (obj.params.oldSelection) {
1002               this.editor.setSelection(obj.params.oldSelection);
1003             }
1004           }
1005           else {
1006             console.log('Error: unknown action "' + obj.action + '"');
1007           }
1008         }
1009         this.index--;
1010 
1011         // fire onchange event
1012         this.onChange();
1013       }
1014     };
1015 
1016     /**
1017      * Redo the last action
1018      */
1019     History.prototype.redo = function () {
1020       if (this.canRedo()) {
1021         this.index++;
1022 
1023         var obj = this.history[this.index];
1024         if (obj) {
1025           var action = this.actions[obj.action];
1026           if (action && action.redo) {
1027             action.redo(obj.params);
1028             if (obj.params.newSelection) {
1029               this.editor.setSelection(obj.params.newSelection);
1030             }
1031           }
1032           else {
1033             util.log('Error: unknown action "' + obj.action + '"');
1034           }
1035         }
1036 
1037         // fire onchange event
1038         this.onChange();
1039       }
1040     };
1041 
1042     return History;
1043 });
1044

1047  */

1052             'Everything': 'everything.js'
1053         }
1054     }
1055 );

1132 /**
1133  * @author 唐品 (Tang Pin)
1134  * created at 2015-2-8
1135  */
1136 define(['util'],function(util){
1137 
1138     var Node = function(value,app){
1139         this.value = value;
1140         this.formatValue();
1141         this.app = app;
1142         this.childs = [];
1143         this.childrenMap = {};
1144         this.isRootNode = false;
1145         this.id = util.uuid();
1146         // let packages extend the node and listen for events
1147         if(this.app.packages.length > 0){
1148             this.initPackages();
1149         }
1150         this._createDom();
1151         this.getPath();
1152         this.highlighted = false;
1153     };
1154 
1155     /*=============================================================
1156      *                    Static Methods
1157      ==============================================================*/
1158     /**
1159      * Get the node instance by the event.target
1160      * The application would use it to determin
1161      * which node to dispatch events to
1162      * @param target
1163      * @returns {*}
1164      */
1165     Node.getNodeFromTarget = function(target){
1166         while (target) {
1167             if (target.node) {
1168                 return target.node;
1169             }
1170             target = target.parentNode;
1171         }
1172         return undefined;
1173     };
1174 
1175     /**
1176      * Reset index of each child
1177      */
1178     Node.prototype._updateDomIndexes = function(){
1179         var childs = this.childs;
1180         if(childs.length){
1181             childs.forEach(function(child, index){
1182                 child.index = index;
1183                 child.row.setAttribute('childIndex',index);
1184             });
1185         }
1186     };
1187 
1188     /**
1189      * Re-calculate the path of the node's parents
1190      */
1191     Node.prototype.refreshPath = function(){
1192         this.path = [];
1193         var node = this;
1194         while(node){
1195             if(node.parent){
1196                 this.path.unshift(node.parent);
1197             }
1198             node = node.parent;
1199         }
1200     };
1201     /**
1202      * Get the path of the node
1203      * last element of the array is the closest parent of the node
1204      * @returns {Array}
1205      */
1206     Node.prototype.getPath = function(){
1207         this.refreshPath();
1208         return this.path;
1209     };
1210 
1211     /**
1212      * Create the dom of the Node
1213      * @private
1214      */
1215     Node.prototype._createDom = function(){
1216         // the round dot
1217         var dot = crel('a',{class:'dot'},
1218             crel('span',{class:'b'},
1219                 crel('span',{class:'s'}))
1220         );
1221         // text content
1222         var content = crel('div',{class:'project-content',contentEditable:true});
1223         // children wrapper
1224         var children = crel('div',{class:'children'});
1225         var row = crel('div',{class:'project', projectId:this.id}, dot, content, children);
1226         // used when finding node from event target(target.node)
1227         row.node = this;
1228         this.buttonElement = dot;
1229         this.contentElement = content;
1230         this.childrenElement = children;
1231         this.row = row;
1232 
1233         this.setValue();
1234         // tell packages they are ready to  handle DOM
1235         this._onDomReady();
1236     };
1237 
1238     /**
1239      * Rerender DOM structure with current data
1240      */
1241     Node.prototype.refreshDom = function(){
1242         this.childs = [];
1243         this.childrenMap = {};
1244         this._createDom();
1245     };
1246 
1247     /**
1248      * Add the created Node to the DOM
1249      * @param position
1250      */
1251     Node.prototype.adjustDom = function(position){
1252         var self = this;
1253 
1254         if(position){
1255             switch (position.type){
1256                 case 'after':
1257                     insertAfter(position.el);
1258                     break;
1259                 case 'append':
1260                     appendInside(position.el);
1261                     break;
1262                 default:
1263                     break;
1264             }
1265         }else{
1266             this.parent.appendChild(this.row);z
1267         }
1268 
1269         function insertAfter(el){
1270             $(el).after(self.row);
1271         }
1272         function appendInside(el){
1273             $(el).append(self.row);
1274         }
1275     };
1276 
1277     /**
1278      * Handle events
1279      * @param {event object} event event object from browser
1280      */
1281     Node.prototype.onEvent = function(event){
1282         var type = event.type;
1283         var target = event.target || event.srcElement;
1284 
1285         // Keyboard events
1286         if(type == 'keydown'){
1287             var keyNum = event.keyCode;
1288             // Ctrl + Enter
1289             if(keyNum==13 && event.ctrlKey){
1290                 event.preventDefault();
1291                 this.createSiblingNodeAfter();
1292                 return false;
1293             }
1294             // Shift + Enter
1295             if(keyNum==13 && event.shiftKey){
1296                 event.preventDefault();
1297                 this._onInsertBefore({});
1298                 return false;
1299             }
1300             // Tab
1301             if(9 == event.keyCode){
1302                 event.preventDefault();
1303                 // Shift + Tab
1304                 if(event.shiftKey){
1305                     this.unindent();
1306                 }else{
1307                     this.indent();
1308                 }
1309                 return false;
1310             }
1311             // Delete
1312             if(46 == event.keyCode){
1313                 event.preventDefault();
1314                 this.parent.removeChildAndDom(this);
1315                 return false;
1316             }
1317             // Backspace on an 'empty' node
1318             if(8 == event.keyCode){
1319                 if(this.getContent() == ""){
1320                     this.parent.removeChildAndDom(this);
1321                 }
1322             }
1323             // move events
1324             if(this.app.mode == "move"){
1325             }
1326         }
1327 
1328         // Mouse click events
1329         if(type == 'click'){
1330             if(target == this.buttonElement
1331                 || target == this.buttonElement.childNodes[0]
1332                 || target == this.buttonElement.childNodes[0].childNodes[0]){
1333                 if(!event.altKey){
1334                     this._onZoomIn();
1335                 }else{
1336                     this.collapse();
1337                 }
1338 
1339             }
1340             if(target == this.contentElement){
1341                 this.app.setCurentNode(this);
1342             }
1343         }
1344 
1345         if( type == 'keyup' ||
1346             type == 'paste'||
1347             type == 'cut' ) {
1348             // update value
1349             this.onValueChange();
1350         }
1351 
1352         // content change
1353         if(event.type == 'input'){
1354             this.onValueChange();
1355         }
1356 
1357 
1358         // send events to packages' handler
1359         this.packageEventsHandle(event);
1360     };
1361 
1362     /* ============================================================
1363      *                   Package Management
1364      * ============================================================*/
1365 
1366     /**
1367      * Let handlers from packages handle events
1368      * @param events
1369      */
1370     Node.prototype.packageEventsHandle = function(events){
1371         var thisNode = this;
1372         if(this.packageEvents && this.packageEvents.length){
1373             $.each(this.packageEvents, function(index,value){
1374                 value.call(thisNode,events);
1375             });
1376         }
1377     };
1378     /**
1379      * Extend the node instance with package instance
1380      * @param packageNameList
1381      */
1382     Node.prototype.initPackages = function(){
1383         var thisNode = this;
1384 
1385         this.packageEvents = this.packageEvents || [];
1386         this.packages = this.app.getPackages();
1387         this.value.packageValue = this.value.packageValue || {};
1388 
1389         $.each(this.packages, function(index, value){
1390             if(value.node){
1391                 $.extend(thisNode, value.node);
1392             }
1393             if(value.onEvent){
1394                 thisNode.packageEvents.push(value.onEvent);
1395             }
1396 
1397         });
1398     };
1399 
1400     /* ============================================================
1401      *                   Data  Export && Import
1402      * ============================================================*/
1403     Node.prototype.onValueChange = function(){
1404         if(this.app.creating){
1405             return;
1406         }
1407         this.updateValue();
1408         if(this.parent){
1409             this.parent.onValueChange();
1410         }
1411 
1412         this.app.onAction('valueChange',{
1413             node:this
1414         });
1415     };
1416     Node.prototype.updateValue = function(){
1417         this.value = this.getValue();
1418     };
1419     /**
1420      * Get value, value is a JSON structure
1421      */
1422     Node.prototype.getValue = function(){
1423         var thisNode = this;
1424         this.value.content = this.contentElement.innerHTML;
1425         this.value.children = [];
1426         if(this.hasChild()){
1427             this.childs.forEach(function(v){
1428                 thisNode.value.children.push(v.getValue());
1429             });
1430         }
1431         return this.value;
1432     };
1433 
1434     /**
1435      * Format the value into complete style
1436      */
1437     Node.prototype.formatValue = function(){
1438         if(Array.isArray(this.value)){
1439             // root node's value is an array
1440             this.value = {
1441                 content: "",
1442                 children: this.value,
1443                 packageValue: {}
1444             };
1445             return this.value;
1446         }
1447         if((typeof this.value == 'string') || this.value.constructor == String){
1448             // string means no child nodes and no packageValue
1449             this.value = {
1450                 content:this.value,
1451                 children:[],
1452                 packageValue:{}
1453             };
1454         }
1455         if(!this.value.content){
1456             this.value.content = "";
1457         }
1458         if(!this.value.children){
1459             this.value.children = [];
1460         }
1461     };
1462 
1463     /**
1464      * Set content and children of the node,
1465      * @param {String|Array|Object} value content of the Node
1466      */
1467     Node.prototype.setValue = function(value){
1468         if(value){
1469             // reset value
1470             this.value = value;
1471             this.formatValue();
1472         }
1473         if(this.value){
1474             this.setContent(this.value.content);
1475             this.setChildren(this.value.children);
1476         }else{
1477             // create the node with null data
1478             this.setValue('');
1479         }
1480     };
1481 
1482     /**
1483      * Set the content
1484      * @param value
1485      */
1486     Node.prototype.setContent= function(value){
1487         //var value = value || this.value;
1488         if((typeof value == 'string') || value.constructor == String){
1489             this.content = value;
1490             this.contentElement.innerHTML = this.content;
1491             this.onValueChange();
1492         }
1493     };
1494 
1495     /**
1496      * Set parent Node
1497      * @param {Node}parent
1498      */
1499     Node.prototype.setParent = function(parent){
1500         this.parent = parent;
1501     };
1502 
1503     /**
1504      * Set the children Nodes
1505      * @param {Array} children value array to create children
1506      */
1507     Node.prototype.setChildren = function(children){
1508         var self = this;
1509         if(Array.isArray(children) && children.length>0) {
1510             children.forEach(function(value,index){
1511                 self._createChild(value);
1512             });
1513             // change style of the dot if has children
1514             this.row.className += " hasChild";
1515         }
1516     };
1517 
1518     /**
1519      * Get the content of the row
1520      */
1521     Node.prototype.getContent = function(){
1522         this.content = this.contentElement.innerHTML;
1523         return this.content;
1524     };
1525 
1526     /**
1527      * Hide content of the Node,
1528      * show only the children.
1529      * Used when create root Node .etc
1530      */
1531     Node.prototype.setRoot = function(){
1532         this.row.classList.add('root');
1533         this.isRootNode = true;
1534     };
1535 
1536 
1537 
1538 
1539 /* ============================================================
1540  *                   Actions to move nodes
1541  * ============================================================*/
1542 
1543     /**
1544      * Get sibling node before/after this node,
1545      * get parent node,
1546      * get child nodes
1547      * @param position
1548      */
1549     Node.prototype.getRelativeNode = function(position){
1550         switch (position){
1551             case 'before':
1552                 var prevNodeElement = this.row.previousSibling;
1553                 if(prevNodeElement){
1554                     var prevNodeId = prevNodeElement.getAttribute('projectId');
1555                     return this.parent.findChildById(prevNodeId);
1556                 }else{
1557                     return null;
1558                 }
1559                 break;
1560             case 'after':
1561                 if(this.parent){
1562                     var afterNode = this.parent.childs[this.index+1];
1563                     if(afterNode){
1564                         return afterNode;
1565                     }else{
1566                         return null;
1567                     }
1568                 }else{
1569                     return null;
1570                 }
1571                 break;
1572         }
1573     };
1574     /**
1575      * Add a Node as a sibling Node right after this node
1576      * @param {Node} node node to moved
1577      */
1578     Node.prototype.addSiblingNodeBefore = function(node){
1579         if(this.isRootNode){
1580             // you can't add a sibling node for rootNode
1581             // that's why we call it a ROOT node
1582             return;
1583         }
1584         if(node.isRootNode){
1585             // it's not a rootNode anymore after you move it
1586             node.isRootNode = false;
1587         }
1588         if(node.parent){
1589             node.parent.removeChild(node);
1590         }
1591         node.setParent(this.parent);
1592         this.parent._addChild(node);
1593         // TODO
1594         // add updateDom method to Node
1595         $(this.row).before(node.row);
1596         this.onValueChange(this.parent);
1597     };
1598     /**
1599      * Add a Node as a sibling Node right before this node
1600      * @param node
1601      */
1602     Node.prototype.addSiblingNodeAfter = function(node){
1603         var nodeAfterThis = this.getRelativeNode('after');
1604         if(nodeAfterThis != null){
1605             nodeAfterThis.addSiblingNodeBefore(node);
1606         }else{
1607             // this is the last child of its parent node
1608             this.parent.appendChild(node);
1609         }
1610         this.onValueChange(this.parent);
1611     };
1612 
1613     Node.prototype.addChildNodeAtHead = function(node){
1614 
1615     };
1616     Node.prototype.addChildNodeAtTail= function(){
1617 
1618     };
1619     /**
1620      * Create an empty Node after this node
1621      */
1622     Node.prototype.createSiblingNodeAfter = function(){
1623         var siblingNode = new Node({},this.app);
1624         siblingNode.setParent(this.parent);
1625         siblingNode.adjustDom({type:'after',el:this.row});
1626         this.parent._addChild(siblingNode);
1627         siblingNode.focus(siblingNode.contentElement);
1628         this.onValueChange(this.parent);
1629     };
1630 
1631 /* ============================================================
1632  *                   Actions of child nodes
1633  * ============================================================*/
1634 
1635     /**
1636      * Create a child Node
1637      * called when initiating this node's child nodes
1638      * @private
1639      * @param {object} value
1640      */
1641     Node.prototype._createChild = function(value){
1642         var childNode = new Node(value,this.app);
1643         childNode.setParent(this);
1644         childNode.adjustDom({type:'append',el:this.childrenElement});
1645         childNode.index = this.childs.length;
1646         this._addChild(childNode);
1647         childNode.focus(childNode.contentElement);
1648         this.onValueChange(this.parent);
1649     };
1650     /**
1651      * Append a child Node at the tail of the Node
1652      * @param child
1653      */
1654     Node.prototype.appendChild = function(child){
1655         this.childrenElement.appendChild(child.row);
1656         this._addChild(child);
1657         child.index = this.childs.length;
1658         this.onValueChange(this.parent);
1659     };
1660     /**
1661      * Add a node to the children node map
1662      * @private
1663      */
1664     Node.prototype._addChild = function(childNode){
1665         this.childs.push(childNode);
1666         this.childrenMap[childNode.id] = childNode;
1667         this.onValueChange(this.parent);
1668     };
1669 
1670     /**
1671      * Remove specific child
1672      * @param {Node}node of the child Node
1673      */
1674     Node.prototype.removeChild = function(node){
1675         var childNode = this.childrenMap[node.id];
1676         this.childs = this.childs.filter(function(child){
1677             return child.id != node.id;
1678         });
1679         //childNode.row.parentNode.removeChild(childNode.row);
1680         this.childrenMap[node.id] = undefined;
1681         this._updateDomIndexes();
1682         this.onValueChange(this.parent);
1683     };
1684 
1685     Node.prototype.removeChildAndDom = function(node){
1686         var childNode = this.childrenMap[node.id];
1687         if(childNode.row.parentNode){
1688             childNode.row.parentNode.removeChild(childNode.row);
1689         }
1690         this.removeChild(node);
1691     };
1692 
1693     /**
1694      * Tell if the Node has children
1695      */
1696     Node.prototype.hasChild = function(){
1697         return this.childs.length;
1698     };
1699 
1700 
1701     /* ============================================================
1702      *                   Event Handlers
1703      * ============================================================*/
1704 
1705     /**
1706      * Insert a new Node before this node
1707      * @param {Object} value value to initiating a node
1708      */
1709     Node.prototype._onInsertBefore = function(value){
1710         var newNode = new Node(value,this.app);
1711         newNode.setParent(null);
1712         this.addSiblingNodeBefore(newNode);
1713         newNode.focus(newNode.contentElement);
1714         this.onValueChange(this.parent);
1715         // add the action to the History(redoMgr)
1716     };
1717 
1718     /**
1719      * Insert a new Node after this node
1720      * @param {Object} value value to initiating a node
1721      */
1722     Node.prototype._onInsertAfter = function(value){
1723         var newNode = new Node(value, this.app);
1724         newNode.setParent(null);
1725         this.addSiblingNodeAfter(newNode);
1726         newNode.focus(newNode);
1727         // add the action to the History
1728         this.app.onAction('insertAfter',{
1729             'node':newNode,
1730             'afterNode':this,
1731             'parent':this.parent
1732         });
1733         this.onValueChange(this.parent);
1734     };
1735     /**
1736      * Indent the Node,
1737      * turn the  node into a child node of the sibling node before it.
1738      */
1739     Node.prototype._onIndent = function(){
1740         // if this node is not the first node
1741         var prevNode = this.getRelativeNode('before');
1742         if(prevNode){
1743             prevNode.appendChild(this);
1744             this.setParent(prevNode);
1745         }
1746         this.onValueChange(this.parent);
1747     };
1748     /**
1749      *
1750      */
1751     Node.prototype._onUnshift = function(value){
1752         var newNode = new Node(value, this.app);
1753         newNode.setParent(this);
1754         this.onValueChange(this.parent);
1755     };
1756     Node.prototype._onZoomIn = function(){
1757         this.app.onAction('zoomin',{
1758             node:this
1759         });
1760     };
1761 
1762     /**
1763      * Events handler to be over written by Packages
1764      * TODO
1765      * replace it with Event Manager
1766      * @private
1767      */
1768     Node.prototype._onDomReady = function(){};
1769 
1770 
1771     /**
1772      * Focus on the element
1773      * TODO: need to be rewrite
1774      */
1775     Node.prototype.focus = function(el){
1776         //var el = this.contentElement;
1777         var range = document.createRange();
1778         var sel = window.getSelection();
1779         if(el.innerHTML.length){
1780             range.setStart(el,1);
1781             range.setEnd(el,1);
1782         }else{
1783             range.setStart(el,0);
1784             range.setEnd(el,0);
1785         }
1786         sel.removeAllRanges();
1787         sel.addRange(range);
1788         el.focus();
1789     };
1790     Node.prototype.blur = function(){
1791         this.contentElement.blur();
1792     };
1793 
1794     /**
1795      * Indent the Node,
1796      * turn the  node into a child node of the sibling node before it.
1797      */
1798     Node.prototype.indent = function(){
1799         // if is not the first node
1800         if(this.row.previousSibling){
1801             var prevNode = this.getRelativeNode('before');
1802             this.parent.removeChildAndDom(this);
1803             prevNode.appendChild(this);
1804             this.parent = prevNode;
1805             this.focus(this.contentElement);
1806         }
1807         this.onValueChange(this.parent);
1808     };
1809 
1810     Node.prototype.unindent= function(){
1811         if(!this.parent){
1812             return;
1813         }
1814         this.parent.addSiblingNodeAfter(this);
1815         //TODO 有问题
1816         // this.parent.removeChild(this.id);
1817         this.onValueChange(this.parent);
1818     };
1819 
1820     Node.prototype.getPrevNode = function(){
1821         if(!this.prevNodeElement || !this.prevNode){
1822             if(this.row.previousSibling){
1823                 this.prevNodeElement = this.row.previousSibling;
1824                 var prevNodeId = this.prevNodeElement.getAttribute('projectId');
1825                 this.prevNode = this.parent.findChildById(prevNodeId);
1826                 return this.getPrevNode();
1827             }else{
1828                 // no previousSibling
1829                 return false;
1830             }
1831         }else{
1832             return {
1833                 'el':   this.prevNodeElement,
1834                 'node': this.prevNode
1835             }
1836         }
1837     };
1838 
1839 
1840 
1841     /**
1842      * Collapse the children of the Node
1843      * @param {boolean} recursion
1844      */
1845     Node.prototype.collapseAnimating = false;
1846     Node.prototype.collapse = function(recursion){
1847         if(this.collapseAnimating){return;}
1848         this.collapseAnimating = true;
1849         if(!this.hasChild()){
1850             return;
1851         }
1852         // $(this.childrenElement).slideToggle(200);
1853         var self = this;
1854         if($(this.childrenElement).hasClass('collapse')){
1855            $(self.row).removeClass('collapse');
1856            $(this.childrenElement).animate({height:this.childrenHeight}, 200, function(){
1857                    $(this).removeClass('collapse');
1858                    $(this).removeAttr('style');
1859                    self.collapseAnimating = false;
1860            });
1861         }else{
1862            this.childrenHeight = $(this.childrenElement).height();
1863            $(self.row).addClass('collapse');
1864            $(this.childrenElement).animate({height:0},200,function(){
1865                $(this).addClass('collapse');
1866                self.collapseAnimating = false;
1867            });
1868         }
1869 
1870     };
1871 
1872 
1873     Node.prototype.expand = function(){};
1874 
1875     Node.prototype._destroy = function(){
1876         //this.row.parentNode.removeChild(this.row);
1877     };
1878     Node.prototype.findChildById = function(id){
1879         return this.childrenMap[id];
1880     };
1881 
1882     /**
1883      * Highlight node with background color when
1884      * app is at 'move' mode
1885      * @type {Function}
1886      */
1887     Node.prototype.highlight = function(){
1888         this.highlighted = true;
1889         this.contentElement.classList.add('highlight');
1890     };
1891     Node.prototype.noHighlight = function(){
1892         this.highlighted = false;
1893         this.contentElement.classList.remove('highlight');
1894     };
1895 
1896     Node.prototype.move = function(event){
1897         event.preventDefault();
1898         // move to next node
1899         var nextNode = this.getRelativeNode('after');
1900         if(nextNode){
1901             this.noHighlight();
1902             nextNode.highlight();
1903             this.app.setCurentNode(nextNode);
1904         }
1905         return false;
1906     };
1907 
1908     return Node;
1909 });

1958 define(function(){
1959 
1960     var Toolbar = function(option){
1961         this.container = document.querySelector(option.container);
1962         this.switcherEl = option.switcherEl;
1963         this.panelClass = option.panelClass;
1964         this.buttonClass = option.buttonClass;
1965         this.eventMgr = option.eventMgr;
1966         this.init();
1967     };
1968     Toolbar.prototype.init = function(){
1969         var self = this;
1970         this.switcherEl.forEach(function(v){
1971             self.container.querySelector(v.button).addEventListener('click', function(e){
1972                 self.switchPanel(v);
1973                 self.eventMgr.fire('panelChange', {panel: v.name, from: 'toolbar'});
1974             });
1975         });
1976     };
1977     Toolbar.prototype.on = function(type, el, handler){
1978         this.buttons.push(el);
1979         var self = this;
1980         handler.forEach(function(v){
1981             self.container.querySelector(el).addEventListener(v.type, v.callback);
1982         });
1983     };
1984     Toolbar.prototype.switchPanel = function(p){
1985         if(this.currentPanel = p){
1986             return;
1987         }
1988         var panel = p.panel,
1989             button = p.button;
1990         $(this.panelClass).hide();
1991         $(panel).show();
1992         $(this.buttonClass).removeClass('hi');
1993         $(button).addClass('hi');
1994         this.currentPanel = p;
1995     };
1996 
1997     return Toolbar;
1998 });

2000 define(function(){
2001     var util = {};
2002     util.uuid = function guid() {
2003         function s4() {
2004             return Math.floor((1 + Math.random()) * 0x10000)
2005                 .toString(16)
2006                 .substring(1);
2007         }
2008         return s4() + s4() + '-' + s4() + '-' + s4() + '-' +
2009             s4() + '-' + s4() + s4() + s4();
2010     };
2011     return util;
2012 });

2021 /**
2022  * @author 唐品(Tang Pin)
2023  * Created on 3/10/15.
2024  */
2025 define(function(require,exports,module){
2026     var editor = {
2027         name:'editor',
2028         extraValue: ['editorContent'],
2029         node:{},
2030         onEvent:{}
2031     };
2032     // Add buttons and Editor to DOM
2033     editor.node._onDomReady = function(){
2034         console.log('editor package init');
2035         var node = this;
2036         // application events
2037         this.app.eventMgr.addListener('themeChange', function(theme){
2038             switch (theme){
2039                 case 'dark':
2040                     theme = 'monokai';
2041                     break;
2042                 case 'light':
2043                     theme = 'xq-light';
2044                     break;
2045             }
2046             if(node.hasLauchEditor){
2047                 node.unLaunchEditor();
2048                 node.launchEditor(theme);
2049             }
2050         });
2051         if(!this.value.packageValue.editor){
2052             this.value.packageValue.editor = {
2053                 editorContent:""
2054             };
2055         }
2056         //this.packageValue['editor'] = {};
2057     };
2058     editor.onEvent = function(event){
2059         var type = event.type,
2060             target = event.target;
2061         var toggleEditor = function(node){
2062             if(!node.editorHasLaunched){
2063                 node.launchEditor();
2064                 node.editorHasLaunched = true;
2065             }else{
2066                 node.unLaunchEditor();
2067                 node.editorHasLaunched = false;
2068             }
2069         };
2070         if(type == 'keydown'){
2071             // keydown events
2072             if(79 == event.keyCode && event.altKey){
2073                 // Alt + O
2074                 event.preventDefault();
2075                 // toggle editor
2076                 toggleEditor(this);
2077                 return false;
2078             }
2079         }
2080         // click event
2081         if(type == 'click' && event.altKey){
2082             if(target == this.buttonElement
2083                 || target == this.buttonElement.childNodes[0]
2084                 || target == this.buttonElement.childNodes[0].childNodes[0]){
2085                 toggleEditor();
2086             }
2087         }
2088 
2089 
2090     };
2091     editor.node.editorHasLaunched = false;
2092     var getTheme = function(appTheme){
2093         var theme;
2094         switch (appTheme){
2095             case 'dark':
2096                 theme = 'monokai';
2097                 break;
2098             case 'light':
2099                 theme = 'xq-light';
2100                 break;
2101         }
2102         return theme;
2103     };
2104     editor.node.launchEditor = function(theme){
2105         var thisnode = this;
2106         this.row.classList.add('package', 'editor');
2107         this.titleElement = crel('div',{class:'title',contentEditable:'true'},this.value.content);
2108         this.editorElement = crel('div',{class:'editor'},this.titleElement);
2109         this.row.insertBefore(this.editorElement,this.childrenElement);
2110         // add codemirror
2111         var createCodeMirror = function(el,contentValue,theme){
2112             var theme = theme || 'xq-light';
2113             var codeMirrorOptions = {
2114                 theme: theme,
2115                 tabSize: 4,
2116                 lineNumbers: false,
2117                 lineWrapping: true,
2118                 autoCloseBrackets: true,
2119                 extraKeys: this.keyMaps,
2120                 mode: {
2121                     name: 'markdown',
2122                     underscoresBreakWords: false,
2123                     taskLists: true,
2124                     fencedCodeBlocks: true
2125                 },
2126                 value:contentValue,
2127                 placeholder: 'content...'
2128             };
2129             return new CodeMirror(el, codeMirrorOptions);
2130         };
2131 
2132         this.cm = createCodeMirror(this.editorElement,
2133             this.value.packageValue.editor.editorContent || "",
2134             getTheme(this.app.theme));
2135         this.cm.on('change', function(cm,obj){
2136             thisnode.onEditorContentChange(cm,obj);
2137         });
2138         this.hasLauchEditor = true;
2139         this.focus(this.titleElement);
2140 
2141 
2142     };
2143     editor.node.unLaunchEditor = function(){
2144         $(this.row).removeClass("editor");
2145         this.row.classList.remove('editor');
2146         this.row.removeChild(this.editorElement);
2147         this.codemirror = undefined;
2148         this.hasLauchEditor = false;
2149     };
2150     editor.node.onEditorContentChange = function(editor,changeObj){
2151         console.log('change event');
2152         this.editorSave(editor.getDoc().getValue());
2153         this.onValueChange();
2154     };
2155     editor.node.editorSave = function(content){
2156         this.value.packageValue.editor.editorContent = content;
2157     };
2158 
2159     return editor;
2160     //module.exports = editor;
2161 });

2168 define(function(require, exports, module){
2169     var strRegex = '((https|http|ftp|rtsp|mms)?://)'
2170         + '?(([0-9a-z_!~*\'().&=+$%-]+: )?[0-9a-z_!~*\'().&=+$%-]+@)?' //ftp的user@
2171         + '(([0-9]{1,3}.){3}[0-9]{1,3}' // IP形式的URL- 199.194.52.184
2172         + '|' // 允许IP和DOMAIN（域名）
2173         + '([0-9a-z_!~*\'()-]+.)*' // 域名- www.
2174         + '([0-9a-z][0-9a-z-]{0,61})?[0-9a-z].' // 二级域名
2175         + '[a-z]{2,6})' // first level domain- .com or .museum
2176         + '(:[0-9]{1,4})?' // 端口- :80
2177         + '((/?)|' // a slash isn't required if there is no file name
2178         + '(/[0-9a-z_!~*\'().;?:@&=+$,%#-]+)+/?)';
2179     var re=new RegExp(strRegex);
2180     var highlight = {
2181         name: 'hightlight'
2182     };
2183     /**
2184      * Will be trigged after the package is loaded
2185      * @param app
2186      */
2187     highlight.init = function(app){
2188         // listen for content change in the node
2189         app.on('contentChange', function(node){
2190             console.log('highlight'+node.value.content);
2191             //node.setContent(node.value.content.replace(re, '<a href="$&">$&</a>'));
2192         });
2193     };
2194 
2195     module.exports = highlight;
2196 });
